God, please. Come on, come on.

yeah, well, I thought I'd fix her up,

translation.en: Everything's under control. Yes, yes, yes.
translation.zh: ‎不 乔瑟夫在牧场 一切都在控制之下 ‎没错

translation.en: Crazy idea, I'll try his phone again.
translation.zh: ‎虽然不抱希望 我再打他电话试试

translation.en: [Manny] What am I doing with my life?
The last time I was all the way out here,
translation.zh: ‎我上次来这里还是和我爸一起呢
‎我上次来这里还是和我爸一起呢 ‎真的吗？

translation.en: He said the stars were brighter at the edge of the property.
translation.zh: ‎他说牧场边缘的星星更加闪亮

translation.en: And, uh, that old dairy barn,
that was his last unfinished project.
translation.zh: ‎那是他最后一个未完成的项目

translation.en: He said he was gonna turn it into something magical one day.
translation.zh: ‎他说他有一天会把它改造得奇妙无比
‎这个伤疤是哪儿来的？ ‎锯子割伤的

translation.en: didn't really get to see my Dad all that much.
It was usually every other weekend,
and he was working on some engine.
I'm talking like a-- It was a tool bench,
translation.zh: ‎真的很彻底 有一个工具台

translation.en: and raised racks, and we did the whole-the whole thing.
translation.zh: ‎一个高架 我们全部都做了个遍

translation.en: I loved being around my dad.
can't really remember his face, or his-or his eyes.
translation.zh: ‎已经记不大清他的脸或眼睛了

translation.en: I could never forget his hands.
I've been thinking about him a lot lately.
I knew there was something off about him.
translation.zh: ‎我之前就觉得他有点不对劲
‎卡莉 我… ‎先生 她来了
‎喂 站住 ‎我的天啊 乔瑟夫

translation.en: Why are you dressed like that?
You can't take away their home.
No, no, you can't. That's the thing.
translation.zh: ‎不 你不能 这就是重点

translation.en: Not with all your money, and all your lawyers.
There's nothing you can do to get them
All right, they've shown me that this past week.
translation.zh: ‎这就是我这一周对她们的观察

translation.en: This isn't just a piece of land to them.
They have a connection to this place that you will never understand.
translation.zh: ‎你永远不会懂她们对这里的深厚感情

translation.en: You've been lying to me this whole time?
You've been livin' on the ranch all this time,
playing house with the farmer's daughter?
translation.zh: ‎和农夫的女儿一起过家家吗？

translation.en: I don't care what you think I am.
I'm not gonna let you do this.
This is the running total of the cost for your mother's past medical care.
translation.zh: ‎这是你母亲过去医疗费用的总计

translation.en: It is quite large, and it has gone to collection.
translation.zh: ‎数目相当大 已经进入追债程序了

translation.en: Oh, well, there's more than enough in my life insurance to cover this.
translation.zh: ‎我的人寿保险足够支付这个了

translation.en: It's nothing for you to worry about, honey.
translation.zh: ‎你完全不用担心 亲爱的

translation.en: That would have been true had your husband
not taken a loan against it five years ago.
translation.zh: ‎但你丈夫五年前拿那笔钱抵押借贷了

translation.en: The Bernet Ranch Winery? Sound familiar?
translation.zh: ‎你应该听说过伯尔内牧场酒庄吧？

translation.en: We are going to increase our offer for your property
translation.zh: ‎我们会增加对你们家地产的出价

translation.en: by the amount on that paper.
Your bill will go away, as will all of your troubles.
translation.zh:
‎你们的帐单会消失
‎所有烦恼也将消失

translation.en: Mom, Mom... we can cover this.
We've been keeping this ranch afloat all these years
translation.zh: ‎这些年来 我们只是勉强支撑着牧场

translation.en: by the skin of our teeth. We can't do it anymore.
translation.zh: ‎这些年来 我们只是勉强支撑着牧场 ‎我们不能再这样下去了

translation.en: or the bank is going to seize the property.
translation.zh: ‎要么银行就会没收这块地产

translation.en: Now, there will be a fourteen day escrow.
translation.zh: ‎好的 这会有14天的托管期

translation.en: Your move out date will be January 6th.
I can have the best movers come down here and help.
translation.zh: ‎我可以请最棒的人手来帮你们搬家

translation.en: But I signed the property over to my daughter last year,
translation.zh: ‎但是我去年把产权给了我女儿 所以

translation.en: so you'll have to get her to sign.
translation.zh: ‎但是我去年把产权给了我女儿 所以 ‎你必须让她签字

translation.en: We will look over the contract and get back to you.
translation.zh: ‎我们会仔细看合同 然后给你答复

translation.en: This is the best choice and you know it.
Don't let your pride get in the way -of a smart decision. -Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎别让你的自尊心阻止你做明智的决定

translation.en: I'll see you to the door.
-Callie, I'm sorry. -What's your real name again?
translation.zh:
‎-卡莉 对不起
‎-你的真名是什么来着？

translation.en: If you're going to call me Callie, I would love to know what I should call you.
translation.zh: ‎你叫我卡莉 那我得知道怎么称呼你

translation.en: Did you have a nice time here, Joseph?
translation.zh: ‎你在这里过得愉快吗 乔瑟夫？

translation.en: -Slumming it with us? -Callie, I wasn't sl--
translation.zh:
‎-和我们过苦日子？
‎-卡莉 我没有…

translation.en: everything I've felt for you, it was real.
But the only I know for sure right now,
is that you're a great liar.
I only lied about my name.
You lied about who you are.
Callie, I had no idea who I was...
translation.zh: ‎卡莉 我根本不知道我是谁

translation.en: Now, look, I can fix this. I just need--
translation.zh: ‎我可以解决这事 我只需要…

translation.en: I don't need a knight in shining armor to rescue me.
translation.zh: ‎我不需要身穿盔甲的骑士来救我！

translation.en: Get the hell off my property.
I'm sorry to hear about the girl, man.
You never know. She might come around.
Are you sleeping in your truck?
You know that there's a set up with a trailer?
translation.zh: ‎你知道那儿有拖车可以睡吗？

translation.en: No, I'm sad to say this, man, but it looks like they're gonna sell.
translation.zh: ‎不 说来难过 但看来她们会同意出售

translation.en: This is just until I find another ranch with some trade housing.
translation.zh: ‎我找到另一家劳作换住宿的活儿就行

translation.en: How are you gonna play all your games?
Here. I want you to have this.
translation.zh: ‎给 ‎这个送给你 你可以装游戏
‎这个送给你 你可以装游戏

translation.en: And, uh, Manny, I want to thank you
Yeah, I guess I'll miss you, too.
Look, no big deal. I'm coming in.
-What? -I just can't choose one. There's a lot of great wines up here.
translation.zh: ‎怎么？这里好酒太多了 我选不出来

translation.en: Well, you might as well add this to your collection.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 那你把这瓶也拿上吧

translation.en: There's a small vineyard on the Bernet ranch.
translation.zh: ‎伯尔内牧场上有一个小葡萄园

translation.en: Yeah, they-they brew it there, I guess.
translation.zh: ‎对 好像还是在那儿酿造的
‎乔瑟夫 葡萄酒不是酿出来的 是发酵
‎乔瑟夫 葡萄酒不是酿出来的 是发酵 ‎白痴
‎好了 我就是那个意思嘛

translation.en: Oh, sorry, it must have turned.
Gosh, how did I screw this up so badly?
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我怎么把事情搞得这么糟？

translation.en: Leo, I finally found a girl that I care about and I blew it.
translation.zh: ‎我好不容易找到一个我在乎的姑娘 ‎我却搞砸了

translation.en: Are you guys even listening to me?
Did they make this on that ranch?
translation.zh: ‎这是她们在那个牧场上做的吗？

translation.en: This is the greatest wine I've ever tasted.
translation.zh: ‎这是我喝过的最棒的葡萄酒

translation.en: No, they just gift it to friends and family.
translation.zh: ‎不 就是给朋友和家人当礼物而已

translation.en: They should. They'd make a killing.
translation.zh: ‎她们应该卖的 ‎她们会大赚一笔

translation.en: There it is. There it is, yes.
Listen to me, if I hit you,
translation.zh: ‎听我说 ‎如果我打你 我就停不下手

translation.en: I won't be able to stop, and I can't do that.
translation.zh: ‎如果我打你 我就停不下手 ‎我不能那么做

translation.en: Because for some reason, Callie made me promise
translation.zh: ‎因为卡莉居然非要我保证不动手打你

translation.en: to leave you in once piece, so do us both a favor.
translation.zh: ‎因为卡莉居然非要我保证不动手打你 ‎所以我们彼此帮个忙 你回车上去

translation.en: Get back in the car, turn around,
translation.zh: ‎所以我们彼此帮个忙 你回车上去 ‎掉头 不要回来

translation.en: What? What could you possibly have left to say?
translation.zh: ‎搞什么？你还能有什么话想说？

translation.en: You've done enough! She doesn't need this.
translation.zh: ‎你真是够了 ‎她不需要受这种苦

translation.en: And that is exactly why I am here.
So come on, man, just let me make it right.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 你给我个弥补的机会吧

translation.en: And then, if you want to kill me, fine.
translation.zh: ‎然后如果你还想杀我 那就来吧

translation.en: We both know I deserve it.
Connor, we want the same thing.
translation.zh: ‎康纳 我们想要的都一样

translation.en: I might have a way to give some of it back.
translation.zh: ‎我可能有办法帮她找回一点

translation.en: I thought I saw someone working up here.
translation.zh: ‎我就觉得好像看到有人在这里干活

translation.en: I told you to get off my property.
Please tell me that you haven't signed the contract yet.
I just... could you put the shotgun down
translation.zh: ‎好的 只是… ‎你能把枪放下 听我说吗？
‎你能把枪放下 听我说吗？

translation.en: I have an idea that might help you save the ranch.
translation.zh: ‎我有个方法也许可以拯救牧场

translation.en: Fine. In the late 1800s, there was a parasite
translation.zh: ‎好吧 ‎在十九世纪末 ‎有一种叫根瘤蚜虫的寄生虫
‎有一种叫根瘤蚜虫的寄生虫

translation.en: some of the most prestigious of wineries
translation.zh: ‎破坏了法国波尔多久负盛名的酒庄

translation.en: -in all of Bordeaux, France. -What are you talking about?
translation.zh:
‎破坏了法国波尔多久负盛名的酒庄 ‎-你在说什么？
‎-但是

translation.en: But, a few years before the parasite hit,
translation.zh:
‎-你在说什么？
‎-但是 ‎在寄生虫灾害发生的几年前

translation.en: immigrants from France brought grape vines over in suitcases,
translation.zh: ‎来自法国的移民将葡萄藤装入行李箱

translation.en: to plant them in the rich soils of Northern California,
translation.zh: ‎把它们种在了北加州肥沃的土地上

translation.en: creating years of coveted legacy in every single grape.
translation.zh: ‎把它们种在了北加州肥沃的土地上 ‎让每颗葡萄成了一段流传多年的佳话

translation.en: Gosh, don't you get it, Cal? Your dad was right.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 你不明白吗 卡莉？ ‎你爸是对的

translation.en: These grapes, the wine, they could save your ranch.
translation.zh: ‎这些葡萄和葡萄酒可以帮你拯救牧场

translation.en: Now, I know a guy, and he can come out here,
he can sample the wine, and he'll tell you
translation.zh: ‎品尝葡萄酒 告诉你这些葡萄的价值

translation.en: -what the grapes are worth. -There it is.
translation.zh: ‎品尝葡萄酒 告诉你这些葡萄的价值 ‎我就说吧

translation.en: The knight in shining armor coming back to save the day
translation.zh: ‎身穿盔甲的骑士终究前来拯救一切了
‎身穿盔甲的骑士终究前来拯救一切了 ‎并不完全是

translation.en: I told him the grapes were well taken care of.
translation.zh: ‎我跟他说了葡萄有被好好照料

translation.en: On behalf of the Barrel Room Wine Club,
translation.zh: ‎我代表酒桶室葡萄酒俱乐部

translation.en: we are interested in leasing your vines on limited distribution.
translation.zh: ‎想以限量发行的方式租用你的葡萄藤

translation.en: We'd be happy to take your current inventory tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎我们明天就想来收取你现有的存货

translation.en: If you agree on the price,
we can bring the lease agreement upon pickup.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以在提货时带租赁协议过来

translation.en: It looks like you've got around...
And several full French oak barrels, so...
translation.zh: ‎还有几个满满的法国橡木桶 所以…

translation.en: If you're happy with the price, give me a call.
translation.zh: ‎如果你对价格满意 给我打电话

translation.en: Oh, and the monthly lease payment, plus your commission on the sales
translation.zh: ‎每月的租金加上你的销售佣金

translation.en: should be around at least half of that each month.
translation.zh: ‎每个月应该至少有这个数的一半

translation.en: What do you think, Ms. Bernet?
Oh, I'm so proud of you. I love you so much.
translation.zh: ‎我真为你感到骄傲 我好爱你

translation.en: No way. That's the latest system.
Look, I'm sorry, mom, but this was the right thing to do.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 妈 但这样做才是对的

translation.en: I know it's bad for business, bad for the company,
translation.zh: ‎我知道这对生意和公司不利

translation.en: but I had to do it.
I just-- I've never seen you so passionate about,
translation.zh: ‎我从没见过你对任何事情这么有热情
‎我从没见过你对任何事情这么有热情 ‎你无论如何都无法说服我

translation.en: the position is still yours if you want it.
translation.zh: ‎如果你愿意 这个职位还是你的

translation.en: Okay, do you how many guests we have on the list?
translation.zh: ‎好 你知道有多少位客人要来吗？

translation.en: Because last year we didn't have enough brownies,
translation.zh: ‎因为去年我们的布朗尼不够 那真是…

translation.en: and it was-- What is going on here?
translation.zh: ‎因为去年我们的布朗尼不够 那真是… ‎你们是有什么事吗？

translation.en: We just thought maybe we'd have the Christmas party
translation.zh: ‎我们只是想把今年的圣诞派对

translation.en: in the old-- in the old dairy barn this year.
Are you kidding me? That place is a wreck.
translation.zh: ‎你在开玩笑吗？那里简直是一团糟

translation.en: Well... why don't we just show you?
translation.zh: ‎这个嘛 ‎不如我们带你去看吧

translation.en: Oh, it's so magical, isn't it?
I don't know what to say.

translation.zh: ‎（现在道歉会太晚吗？） ‎这样就不用寒暄了 ‎是呀

translation.en: Okay, until you get your shotgun,
I think I have at least a few minutes.
I-I want you to know, the entire time
translation.zh: ‎卡莉 我想让你知道 ‎我给你干活的这一整段时间

translation.en: that I was working for you, it sucked.
translation.zh: ‎我给你干活的这一整段时间 ‎真是糟透了

translation.en: It was the absolute worst. You know, I-I was cold, I was tired,
translation.zh: ‎简直是糟糕到极点 我又冷又累

translation.en: and I smelled like a cow's ass the entire time.
translation.zh: ‎而且身上一直有一股牛屁股味儿

translation.en: But it was the best time of my life.
translation.zh: ‎但那是我一生中最美好的时光

translation.en: And I'd give anything to go back to that.
translation.zh: ‎我愿意付出任何代价再来一次

translation.en: Well, your position has been filled.
translation.zh: ‎这个嘛 ‎你的职位已经有人了

translation.en: Yeah, we got a new ranch hand.
I might be able to figure out something for you to do.
Well, I would need meals this time.
And I would need a place to sleep.
I think I can swing that.
I thought you were long overdue.

translation.zh: ‎（深切缅怀本伯尔内与温蒂伯尔内）
